name: OCTWebViewBridge
description: WKWebView Bridge, Javascript call Native Code.
prepare_command:
echo '        #!/bin/sh

        if [[ -d OCTWebViewBridge.framework ]]; then
          echo "Tdfire: OCTWebViewBridge.framework is not empty"
          exit 0
        fi

        if [[ ! -d tdfire_download_temp ]]; then
          mkdir tdfire_download_temp
        fi

        cd tdfire_download_temp

        curl --fail -O -J -v http://iosframeworkserver-shopkeeperclient.app.2dfire.com/download/OCTWebViewBridge/1.0.7

        if [[ -f OCTWebViewBridge.framework.zip ]]; then
          echo "Tdfire: copying OCTWebViewBridge.framework ..."

          unzip OCTWebViewBridge.framework.zip
          cp -fa OCTWebViewBridge.framework ../
        fi

        cd ..
        rm -fr tdfire_download_temp

        echo "pod cache path for OCTWebViewBridge: $(pwd)"
' > download.sh && sh download.sh && rm download.sh
